messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Virus Alert (Snowhite - the Real Story)

messages.messageBody:
I also received this email - but as long as you do not open the attachment, you
should be fine


|--------+----------------------->
| | "Lynda" |
| | <lurine@softc|
| | om.net> |
| | |
| | 05/23/2001 |
| | 02:15 AM |
| | Please |
| | respond to |
| | Unschooling-d|
| | otcom |
| | |
|--------+----------------------->
>---------------------------------------------------------|
| |
| To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com |
| cc: (bcc: Tammy Graves/DF/HCIA) |
| Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Virus Alert |
>---------------------------------------------------------|






I'm having No. 3 son's girlfriend's father come over in the morning to
"dissect" a virus I received about 10 o'clock. It is the Snow White/HaHaHa
thingy and from what I can tell, it came from this list. Everyone might
want to check.

Lynda
If Ignorance Is Bliss Why Aren't More People Happy?
